heading_7: Frequently Asked Questions About E-sim Kuwait
content_1_heading_7: Do I need to enable roaming setting for using e-sim international plan?
content_2_heading_7: Yes, you need to enable the roaming setting on your e-sim device for using e-sim international plan.
content_3_heading_7: Can I receive phone calls and text messages on e-sim device?
content_4_heading_7: Yes, you can use the phone calls from both regular and e-sim plan on e-sim device. But for having calls from e-sim line ensure to have e-sim plan having local phone number.
